title: Life on the Mississippi - the speaker gains

content.prompt: By learning the language of the river, the speaker gains

choices.label: command of a riverboat, but loses the innocence of youth
pride in his profession, but loses a broader interest in the world
technical knowledge, but loses an appreciation of the river’s beauty
assurance of his abilities, but loses respect for the river’s might

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
